mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(accommodations_id, room_name, price, weekend_price, min_guests, max_guests, room_description, main_image_url, room_status, bathroom_count, room_type, bed_count) VALUES (#{room.accommodationsId}, #{room.roomName}, #{room.price}, #{room.weekendPrice}, #{room.minGuests}, #{room.maxGuests}, #{room.roomDescription}, #{room.mainImageUrl}, #{room.roomStatus}, #{room.bathroomCount}, #{room.roomType}, #{room.bedCount})

INSERT INTO room(accommodations_id, room_name, price, weekend_price, min_guests, max_guests, room_description, main_image_url, room_status, bathroom_count, room_type, bed_count) VALUES
(#{accommodationsId}, #{room.roomName}, #{room.price}, #{room.weekendPrice}, #{room.minGuests}, #{room.maxGuests}, #{room.roomDescription}, #{room.mainImageUrl}, 1, #{room.bathroomCount}, #{room.roomType}, #{room.bedCount})
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id, r.accommodations_id, r.room_name, r.price, r.weekend_price, r.min_guests, r.max_guests, r.room_description, r.main_image_url, r.room_status, r.bathroom_count, r.room_type, r.bed_count FROM room r join accommodation a on a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id where a.accommodations_id = #{accommodationsId} AND r.room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET room_name = #{room.roomName}, price = #{room.price}, weekend_price = #{room.weekendPrice}, min_guests = #{room.minGuests}, max_guests = #{room.maxGuests}, room_description = #{room.roomDescription}, main_image_url = #{room.mainImageUrl}, bathroom_count = #{room.bathroomCount}, room_type = #{room.roomType}, bed_count = #{room.bedCount}, change_info_room = NOW() WHERE accommodations_id = #{accommodationsId} AND room_id = #{roomId}
